#include<cstdio>

int main ( ) {

    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        float x[n+1],y[n+1],sum1=0,sum2=0;

        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            scanf("%f",&x[i]);
        }
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            scanf("%f",&y[i]);
        }
        x[n]=x[0];
        y[n]=y[0];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            sum1+=(x[i]*y[i+1]);
            sum2+=(y[i]*x[i+1]);
        }
        sum1-=sum2;
        sum1/=2;
        if(sum1<0)  sum1*=-1;
        printf("%.1f\n",sum1);
    }

return 0;

}
